title: Nick Cave - The Red Hand Files - Issue #218 - I asked Chat GPT to write a song in the style of Nick Cave and this is what it produced. What do you think?   Verse 1:  In the depths of the night, I hear a call  A voice that echoes, through the hall  It’s a siren’s song, that pulls me in  Takes me to a place, where I can’t begin   Chorus:  I am the sinner, I am the saint  I am the darkness, I am the light  I am the hunter, I am the prey  I am the devil, I am the savior   Verse 2:  I walk the streets, with my head held high  I’ve got my demons, but I’ll make them fly  I’ll dance with the devil, and I’ll play his game  I’ll be the one, to call his name   Chorus:  I am the sinner, I am the saint  I am the darkness, I am the light  I am the hunter, I am the prey  I am the devil, I am the savior   Bridge:  I’ve got the blood of angels, on my hands  I’ve got the fire of hell, in my eyes  I’m the king of the abyss, I’m the ruler of the dark  I’m the one that they fear, in the shadows they hark   Chorus:  I am the sinner, I am the saint  I am the darkness, I am the light  I am the hunter, I am the prey  I am the devil, I am the savior   Outro:  So come with me, to the edge of the night  Where the darkness and the light collide  We’ll walk the line, between the good and the bad  And we’ll see, who comes out on top in the end.

last_post.content:
RT @neilturkewitz@twitter.com

“What makes a great song great is not its close resemblance to a recognizable work. Writing a good song is not mimicry, or replication, or pastiche, it is the opposite. It is an act of self-murder that destroys all one has strived to produce in the past.” https://www.theredhandfiles.com/chat-gpt-what-do-you-think/

🐦🔗: https://twitter.com/neilturkewitz/status/1615143804025044992

Here's the first iteration of the syllabus for this semester's " Introduction to Digital Humanities
Part II: Computational Approaches to Culture." Surprised that there aren't too many TBAs. You may find a few things of interest:

a) The final paper will be co-written with AI.
b) There's a midterm exam whose sole purpose in life is to use it as a tool to build vocab and understanding.
c) I set up a binary between Analysis and Poesis that, spoiler alert, I will undermine during the semester.
d) I barely teach coding. Instead I spend a lot of teaching energy on how to read tutorials and corpus analysis papers.

Tagging @laurenfklein and @zoeleblanc who are going on a similar journey this semester too.

http://teaching.elotroalex.com/s23-intro-dh/

title: Tesla video promoting self-driving was staged, engineer testifies

last_post.content:
wow...

"A 2016 video that Tesla used to promote its self-driving technology was staged to show capabilities like stopping at a red light and accelerating at a green light that the system did not have, according to testimony by a senior engineer.

The video carries a tagline saying: “The person in the driver’s seat is only there for legal reasons. He is not doing anything. The car is driving itself."

https://www.reuters.com/technology/tesla-video-promoting-self-driving-was-staged-engineer-testifies-2023-01-17/

My next book, Blue Machine, has a cover! Earth is home to a huge story that is rarely told - that of our ocean. Not the fish or the dolphins, but the massive ocean engine itself: what it does, why it works, and the many ways it has influenced animals, weather and human history & culture. Blue Machine will tell that story. Out June 1st https://linktr.ee/bluemachinebook #Ocean #BlueMachine #Seas #Climate #Books

title: RFC ft-ietf-dnsind-test-tlds: Reserved Top Level DNS Names

last_post.content:
The same goes for domain names; do NOT use a public domain name you do not control in your configuration, documentation, or UI language.

Instead, use one of the available reserved domain names documented in RFC 2606, such as 'example.com', 'example.net', or the .example top-level domain.

❌ test.com
❌ yourdomain.com
✅ example.com
✅ yourdomain.example

Pass it on to your fellow developers, designers, documentation writers, and so forth.

Full RFC text is here;

https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc2606
DensePose from WiFi - https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.00250

title: 2022 Best Independent and Branded Videos on Vimeo

last_post.content:
The community of creators using Vimeo upload millions of videos every year, hundreds of them are selected as Staff Picks, and only a handful are chosen as the "Best of the Year" by our curation team. These are all videos that you won't want to miss watching!

https://vimeo.com/bestoftheyear

#video #film #creators #makers #directors #art

Abstract a step away from this -- "I agree with the people trying to make things better, but they're trying to make things better the wrong/rude/too fast way" -- and you've got about 95% of "centrist" commentary of the last century.

RT @RottenInDenmark@twitter.com

Reading old op-eds opposing gay marriage and they're all basically, "The gays, while correct, are very rude."

title: Mike Mahoney - spatialsample 0.3.0 is now on CRAN

last_post.content:
📣 Version 0.3.0 of spatialsample just hit CRAN!

spatialsample is an #rstats package for spatial cross-validation (and other resampling), making it easy to validate spatial models in the tidymodels framework.

This version brings improvements to repeats, standardization, repeats, spatial clustering, repeats, and more!

More about it on the blog at: https://www.mm218.dev/posts/2023-01-17-spatialsample/

Package docs at: https://spatialsample.tidymodels.org/

#RSpatial #GISChat
